extendedInfo.description: Start Studying English Today!Now you can apply quickly and easily to Connect School of Languages ESL school based in Toronto, Canada (www.connectlanguage.com). Our mobile application is fast and easy to use. No need to worry about completing paper forms, faxing, scanning, emailing your application. Simply open up the app, complete the application and it is mailed to the Connect Registration Office. Fast and Easy!After completing the Application Form, a representative will contact you. Key Features of the Connect Application Formfast and easy to usedirect enrolment into Connectall courses available to choose fromhomestay options can enter flight information if you have itable to connect to our Facebook and Twitter pages for updatesGet Connected today!
